sentences.en: After a three-weekend courtship, Pamela accepted Randolph's proposal of marriage.
sentences.cn: 经过3个周末的追求之后，帕梅拉接受了伦道夫的求婚。

sentences.en: Are you doing anything nice this weekend?
sentences.cn: 这个周末你有什么好的安排？

sentences.en: Bad weather has caused dozens of flight cancellations over the holiday weekend.
sentences.cn: 恶劣的天气已经导致这个连假周末数十个航班被取消。

sentences.en: He told me to give you a call over the weekend.
sentences.cn: 他让我周末给你打个电话。

sentences.en: His picture was plastered all over the newspapers on the weekend.
sentences.cn: 他的照片占据了周末报纸的头版。

sentences.en: How about…this weekend?
sentences.cn: 这个周末……怎么样？

sentences.en: Jack showed off his latest squeeze at the weekend.
sentences.cn: 周末杰克炫耀了一番自己新交的女朋友。

sentences.en: Members of Parliament are spending the weekend canvassing opinion in their constituencies.
sentences.cn: 国会议员这个周末要向所在选区的选民征求意见。

sentences.en: Miss Windham said she had spoken to them over the weekend.
sentences.cn: 温德姆小姐说她周末已经和他们谈过了。

sentences.en: She knew I wanted to try the boat out at the weekend.
sentences.cn: 她知道我周末想开船出去试一下。

sentences.en: She took the train to New York every weekend.
sentences.cn: 她每个周末乘火车去纽约。

sentences.en: The republic's factories have closed for the weekend to conserve energy.
sentences.cn: 为了节约能源，该共和国的工厂周末不开工。

sentences.en: The scandal took a new turn over the weekend.
sentences.cn: 周末时丑闻有了新的发展。

sentences.en: The unrest capped a weekend of right-wing attacks on foreigners.
sentences.cn: 周末右翼分子对外国人的攻击最终演变成了这场骚乱。

sentences.en: The winner will face the Oakland A's in the playoffs this weekend.
sentences.cn: 获胜者将在本周末的季后赛中对阵奥克兰运动者队。

sentences.en: They drove into the mountains for a weekend of nature study.
sentences.cn: 他们周末开车进山去观察自然。

sentences.en: Tony has been unwell over the weekend (= during the weekend ).
sentences.cn: 托尼这个周末身体不舒服。

sentences.en: We’re going to Paris for a long weekend (= Saturday and Sunday, and also Friday or Monday, or both ).
sentences.cn: 我们要到巴黎去度一个长周末。

sentences.en: What shall we do this weekend?
sentences.cn: 这个周末我们要做什么呢？

sentences.en: What you to do this weekend?
sentences.cn: 你这个周末准备干什么？

sentences.en: Why don't you and I go away this weekend?
sentences.cn: 不如咱俩这个周末出去度假吧？

words.tran_cn: 周末，周末休假；周末聚会

phrases.tran_cn: 在周末；整个周末；经过周末

trans.tran_en: Saturday and Sunday, especially considered as time when you do not work
Saturday and Sunday, especially considered as time when you do not work
